title: Otter
description:
An otter, the playful water mammal in the weasel family. Depicted as a light-brown otter on its back, with its forepaws held together and whiskered face to the left, generally with its long tail curled up.

May be used to refer to certain members of the LGBTQ community, a la the slang term "otter".

Apple’s otter is in water, holding a stone, as is Microsoft’s.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the otter emoji is a delightful and playful creature, depicted with sleek, wet-looking fur and bright, curious eyes. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients give the otter a wonderfully tactile and realistic feel, capturing its aquatic agility. This charming emoji often represents playfulness, joy, curiosity, or a connection to nature and water environments.
